>
[Stoneraiser Javelin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=648)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This stone-headed _+2 striking [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71)_ draws forth the power of the earth itself to strike at enemies.

<document level="2" id="action-499" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stoneraiser Javelin
